attributes.action: Allow dog breeders to band tails
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Breeders should be given the freedom of choice to band puppies tails (as farmers do lambs) if they wish to, if they feel it will prevent future tail damage.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Banding-tails/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
